Description:
We are looking for an experienced Architectural Engineer with experience working for companies in the medical field to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of architectural engineering principles and practices, as well as experience in the design and construction of medical facilities. The Architectural Engineer will be responsible for a variety of tasks, including:Designing and drafting building plans and specifications for medical facilities
Conducting structural analysis and calculations for medical facilities
Preparing cost estimates and schedules for medical facilities
Overseeing construction projects for medical facilities
Inspecting completed projects for medical facilities
Meet with clients and stakeholders to discuss project requirements for medical facilities
Stay up-to-date on the latest architectural engineering trends and technologies, especially as they relate to the medical fieldSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Architectural Engineering or a related field
7+ years of experience in architectural engineering.
Strong technical skills, including proficiency in CAD software
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
